content:
/>
X.ii.1.B.5.a
.
Inapplicability of Protection to Hospital Rate Reductions Under 38 CFR 3.552
Protection under the provisions of either
38 CFR 3.951
or
38 CFR 3.952
of a total rating disability evaluation does not preclude reduction to a hospital rate under
38 CFR 3.552
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Protected Ratings
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
